name: kfm-roadmap-sync
description: Sync .github/roadmap/roadmap.yaml to GitHub labels, milestones, and issues
author: Andy Barta

scripts.check: node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'node:fs'; const p=process.env.ROADMAP_FILE||'.github/roadmap/roadmap.yaml'; fs.accessSync(p); console.log('roadmap file OK:', p); console.log('node', process.version);"
scripts.validate: node --input-type=module -e "import fs from 'node:fs'; import yaml from 'js-yaml'; const p=process.env.ROADMAP_FILE||'.github/roadmap/roadmap.yaml'; yaml.load(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8')); console.log('roadmap.yaml: OK â†’', p);"
scripts.ci: npm run check && npm run validate && npm run fmt:check && npm run audit
